song.englishname: Go Tell It On The Mountain

english.segment1: Chorus: Go tell it on the mountain. Over the hills and everywhere. Go tell it on the mountain. That Jesus Christ is born
english.segment2: The shepherds all were watching. Over the sheep at night. When a guiding star shone from heaven. And they followed that holy light
english.segment4: They found a lowly manger. Where the humble Christ was born. And God sent us salvation. On that blessed Christmas morn
english.segment6: He brought with Him forgiveness. He lived to show us the way. He came to redeem all creation. And to wash all our sins away
